name: Sliced (FreezedIce, Raindrinker)
description:
You play as a slime stuck in a room full of deadly saws. Your goal is to collect a few gems randomly spawned within the room. Seems easy, right? Here is the twist: after completing each level you have to choose between 3 random modifiers which make the next room harder. See how long you can last!

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows - Move
  • Space - Dash/Select

Coding/FX - @FreezedIce

Art - @Raindrinker

Sounds (music) - @Securas
